verses.verse: Judge <S%G2919><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> , that <S%G3363><s%> ye be <S%G2919><s%> not <S%G3363><s%> judged <S%G2919><s%> .

¶ Give <S%G1325><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> that which <S%G3588><s%> is holy <S%G40><s%> unto the dogs <S%G2965><s%> , neither <S%G3366><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> ye your <S%G5216><s%> pearls <S%G3135><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> swine <S%G5519><s%> , lest <S%G3379><s%> they trample <S%G2662><s%> them <S%G846><s%> under <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> turn again <S%G4762><s%> and rend <S%G4486><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> .

¶ Ask <S%G154><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> it shall be given <S%G1325><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> ; seek <S%G2212><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> ye shall find <S%G2147><s%> ; knock <S%G2925><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> it shall be opened <S%G455><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> :

For <S%G1063><s%> every one <S%G3956><s%> that asketh <S%G154><s%> receiveth <S%G2983><s%> ; and <S%G2532><s%> he that seeketh <S%G2212><s%> findeth <S%G2147><s%> ; and <S%G2532><s%> to him that knocketh <S%G2925><s%> it shall be opened <S%G455><s%> .

¶ Enter ye in <S%G1525><s%> at <S%G1223><s%> the strait <S%G4728><s%> gate <S%G4439><s%> : for <S%G3754><s%> wide <S%G4116><s%> is the gate <S%G4439><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> broad <S%G2149><s%> is the way <S%G3598><s%> , that leadeth <S%G520><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> destruction <S%G684><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> there be <S%G1526><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> go in <S%G1525><s%> thereat <S%G1223%G846><s%> :

Ye shall know <S%G1921><s%> them <S%G846><s%> by <S%G575><s%> their <S%G846><s%> fruits <S%G2590%G3385><s%> . Do men gather <S%G4816><s%> grapes <S%G4718><s%> of <S%G575><s%> thorns <S%G173><s%> , or <S%G2228><s%> figs <S%G4810><s%> of <S%G575><s%> thistles <S%G5146><s%> ?

¶ Not <S%G3756><s%> every one <S%G3956><s%> that saith <S%G3004><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%> , Lord <S%G2962><s%> , Lord <S%G2962><s%> , shall enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> ; but <S%G235><s%> he that doeth <S%G4160><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of my <S%G3450><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> which is in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> .

<S%G2532>And<s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass<s%>, <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G4931>ended<s%> <S%G5128>these<s%> <S%G3056>sayings<s%>, the <S%G3793>people<s%> were <S%G1605>astonished<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1322>doctrine<s%>:
